website_summaries.verdict: A wall or desk calendar with a bit of personality.
pros: Plenty of features on each page
"To-do" and goals section on each page and a mini 12-month calendar along the bottom
Holes in the binding allow for wall mounting
It works well as a desk calendar
We love its colors and monthly inspirational messages
cons: The colorful floral pattern may not be for everyone
The calendar is a bit on the heavy side at 1 pound, 8 ounces
The boxes for each day are smaller than on competing models to allow room for the goals and to-do sections

customer_reviews.title: Calendar with Incorrect Dates - Caution
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in Dec 2017. I enjoy the calendar, however I have found a typo that I wanted to bring to your attention. On the calendar page for May 2018, you have given an extra day to April. April does not have a 31st as you show. Sunday should be April 29th, and Monday should be April 30th. I know we all wish we had more time, but I almost schedule a truckload delivery on a day that doesn't exist! Hopefully, there are no more errors to be found.
customer_reviews.author: Creativeidsignr

customer_reviews.title: Starts February 2018...useless for the first month of the year.
customer_reviews.text: Not a complete calendar. Bought this to start off the year (last time I checked, calendars begin with January?!) and it looks like I won't be using it until February... Just a heads up, if you're wanting to buy it for the month of January...don't. Expect to use it from February on. Cute calendar, but wish it actually had the whole year on it...especially if it's being sold in that actual month, and is sold with the label of "January 2018 to December 2018". False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful calendar. There is only one issue. On the page for April, the last 2 days are Sunday the 29th and Monday the 30th. This is correct. On the page for May, the first two days for the end of April are Sunday the 30th, and Monday the 31st. I don’t care about the error, but it should probably be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: I always have a big desk calendar in the kitchen to write all the bills out on so we can keep track of what needs to be paid when and whether I have paid it yet. This calendar is absolutely adorable! I can’t wait to put it out!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nix

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar. The words and numbers are just the right size. Love the extra space for goals and the to do list. Also I appreciate the lines to keep track of multiple items on the same day. This calendar is perfect for my desk.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: These are a great size, and are well designed
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size, and are well designed! Some calendars are too small to write plans in the boxes, but these are just the right size for me! I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jantec Neon Products

customer_reviews.title: but I love this "happy" calendar in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I buy a calendar every year and usually I just buy the basic one because they are more affordable, but I love this "happy" calendar in my kitchen. It is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk calendar
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk calendar! I buy it every year. the To Do Lists on the side are my favorite for adding items i need to follow up on. I use this for work.
customer_reviews.author: NeikaRush

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit for My Wife's Office
customer_reviews.text: Listing is accurate to what we received. There is plenty of room to right notes under each day. The colors are also very vibrant and fit perfect in my wife's office.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar!! It’s so great for my work desk and really lights things up! I love the little notes on holidays too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the goals and to do list each month!
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar. It's perfect for my office desk. I love how it has a spot for goals and to do list each month. It's so helpful and just brightens up my office and day.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bright colors
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd bloom planner...2nd of this design. Beautiful bright colors, plenty of room to write and a section on the side for a running "to do" list. Looks great on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: B Pink

customer_reviews.title: Adorable calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute. It’s very big! But plenty of room to write down things on the dates. Love this calender.

customer_reviews.title: Big and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Didn't exactly pay attention to the dimensions when I ordered it. It is BIG. Love the little quotes on the side. There is plenty of room for notes and to do lists. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick. A little smaller than imagined but is still large enough to write on.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Brightens my day
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional. This calendar brightens my desk and makes me happy when I see the lovely flowers.

customer_reviews.title: So many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Large calender! Many compliments with it at my desk. I don’t actually keep it on my best I have it hung.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Calendar
customer_reviews.text: The calendar is nice but I wish it were larger in size. The design is so nice

customer_reviews.title: This calendar is cheery and just what I need on ...
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is cheery and just what I need on my desk. Lots of room for references and jotting down notes!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this, and loves it. It is bigger than she expected, but she isn't complaining.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE DELIVERY & BOXING / Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product - however.. it’s pretty pathetic how this was laying box open on my front porch.....

customer_reviews.title: Not too big like those other desk calendars
customer_reviews.text: Looooove this calendar!!! Not too big like those other desk calendars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my desk
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my desk. Love that there is a small calendar for each month showing at the bottom of each months page.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: The calendar is pretty but the January page is missing. Who wants a yearly calendar that starts in February.
